description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Create music using a 3D module rack that contains tweakable sample players, sequencers and control modules.  Play live with gamepads, drum kits, guitars or the pattern sequencers. Drums supports velocity sensitive input for nuanced performances.  Connect cables between modules to control sample triggering, sequencing, surround sound and more.  Supports split screen with up to four players.
